posts.title: Emergency Survival Backpack Kit
posts.content: Stay prepared for whatever comes your way by bringing along this emergency survival backpack kit. This water resistant pack is ergonomically designed for both adults and children and features everything you may need during a survival situation.

posts.title: The Turbocharged WiFi Router
posts.content: Congested airwaves and HD bandwidth content are slowing WiFi connections in populated areas – but the innovative Portal router can help solve that! Its unique engineering provides 300% more of the radio airwaves, giving you more speed and more range!

posts.title: Kylo Ren Lightsaber Room Light
posts.content: Give your bedroom an ominous ambiance by channeling the Dark Side using this Kylo Ren lightsaber room light. It easily mounts onto the wall, emits realistic sound effects, and pulses in two stages while giving off a sinister red glow.

posts.title: Floating Swing Chair
posts.content: Relax in the comfort of a hammock without running the fatal risk of falling over the side with the floating swing chair. More than just stylish, the chair’s intrepid design is complemented by an over-sized plush cushion and heavy duty spring for maximum comfort.

posts.title: 3Doodler 3D Printing Pen
posts.content: Take your artistic creations from the 2-dimensional world to the 3-dimensional world with the 3Doodler 3D printing pen. This fun and easy to use pen comes with 75 colored cartridges that rapidly cool after being shot out – allowing you to draw in 3D.

posts.title: Pocket Slingshot
posts.content: Skillfully fire deadly rocks at speeds up to 350 feet per second by shooting them out of this pocket slingshot! Featuring a compact design, this modern slingshot is capable of firing an assortment of different sized projectiles with lethal accuracy.

posts.title: World’s Largest Hershey’s Bar
posts.content: Satisfy your sweet tooth while ensuring onset diabetes after devouring the world’s largest Hershey’s bar. This mammoth 5 pound bar of milk chocolate offers the same classic taste you know and love – just in a way bigger and more satisfying portion.

posts.title: Fabric Cat Maze
posts.content: Keep your curious cat entertained and out of your hair by installing the fabric cat maze in your humble abode. This handmade maze mounts directly onto the wall and provides your kitty with a cool hangout spot useful for rest and/or exercise.

posts.title: 200 Gigabyte Micro SD Card
posts.content: Technology has evolved once again – now you can carry an incredible 200 gigabytes in a storage device smaller than your fingernail. It has the ability to hold over 20 hours of HD footage, making this the world’s highest capacity micro SD card.

posts.title: Foraging & Feeding Mat For Dogs
posts.content: Keep your canine’s sense of smell as sharp as ever by serving your pooch’s snacks or food on this foraging and feeding mat. This machine-washable mat mimics the hunt for food in nature, putting your doggy’s nose and brain to work by encouraging natural foraging skills.

posts.title: Totoro Sleeping Bag
posts.content: Spend the day relaxing with a lovable woodland creature the next time you plop down on the Totoro sleeping bag. Styled to look like a giant Totoro, this over sized cushion makes the ideal spot for a reading nook or taking a light nap.

posts.title: USB LED Fan Clock
posts.content: Keep cool in the midst of a heated coding session with the USB LED fan clock. This neat little device plugs right into your USB slot and displays the time on a spinning LED display that doubles as a fan. It’s the coolest way to keep track of the hours spent on the computer.
